data.text:
RT @flb_xyz: 30 Days of HyperEVM: Day 20

For today we are diving back into a more heavy DeFi focus with an options platform called @supurrâ€¦

30 Days of HyperEVM: Day 20

For today we are diving back into a more heavy DeFi focus with an options platform called @supurr_app

- Visit https://t.co/3pKPLI019u and connect your wallet
- Create your account by signing a transaction and then register the account
- Visit the Wrap tab and wrap some of your HYPE
- Go to Trade and approve WHYPE spending
- Place some Up/Down or Above/Below bets with specified time intervals

Let's see if I can trade profitably lmao

30 Days of Monad Testnet: Day 20

This issue will cover OctoSwap, another DEX building on Monad

- Visit https://t.co/rhtLbHfNgL and connect your wallet
- Swap some tokens (I recommend getting some OCTO)
- Go to the liquidity tab and supply liquidity for one of the available pairs

Pretty simple interactions today, but the team is working on building out a Profile section with referrals as well as some games

For anyone that deposited in the Berachain x Concrete vaults you can now claim your funds

Check the quote-tweeted thread and scroll through for the different claim links (Lombard, Ethena, Dinero)

As you probably already know the yield was dust so time to find a new place to deploy funds, there are a ton of options

The Doodles airdrop checker is live: https://t.co/VMAALqJWyd

This is pretty much straight dust for me and comes off as another way to extract from the Doodles image

I remember seeing the announcement of $DOOD but haven't seen anything regarding utility since

Insta-jeet for me https://t.co/Un58b90BOE

Make sure to turn your notifications on for posts by Fogo

Fogo's custom X leaderboard is based on your engagement with posts from their account

If you comment and engage earlier, you have higher odds of better responses/impressions/etc

I am currently trying to get more active

Nahhh, I just got cooked by Succinct

1.44x multiplier on 100+ stars

Depressing roadblock on my Succinct stars journey but we keep it pushing

What's the lowest multiplier you've gotten? Is it possible to get 1.00? https://t.co/xL6QJUpQIy

Skate just dropped their eligibility checker for their Kaito leaderboard Ollie rewards

- Visit https://t.co/2li73KnLTS and connect your X
- Select Leaderboard Rewards to see if you are eligible

Unfortunately, I was not eligible this time but as someone who is a big fan of interoperability and chain abstraction, I do want to get more involved with Skate

The team just dropped a 1,000 slots for the beta today but unfortunately I saw it too late :/

It's crazy how unserious blockchains can be lmao

Succinct's Blinky drank too much lean and is now disabled until Stage 2

With multiple games now disabled it seems we are getting closer and closer to a Succinct update

Does anyone know why certain games get disabled first? https://t.co/2R0bCzOxPd

Although I don't enjoy doing a long list of social tasks, I have decided to complete the Camp Network quests as it has its own ecosystem hub with custom points (Acorns + Matchsticks)

I'd be surprised if these were treated just as Galxe or Intract points

Get started:

- Visit https://t.co/aIcbfj73uq
- Connect your wallet, fill in profile details, and connect socials
- Start completing tasks to rack up your acorns
- Revisit daily to claim your daily check-in

Let's see together what kind of IP blockchain Camp manages to build

I have a sneaking suspicion that Infinex is not very used and people only yap about the project

THUS

The real way forward is the 2-in-1: yapping about your on chain contributions

I'm starting to do interactions on Infinex each week (aiming to do new chains and ~$10k volume) https://t.co/K0zznK1wzw

30 Days of Monad Testnet: Day 21

Today we will be interacting with another popular DEX on the Monad testnet, @bebop_dex

- Visit https://t.co/pH3WzkKGgG and connect your wallet
- Swap some MON for USDC
- Go to Send and send a tiny amount to someone random

Done. What protocol do you want next?
